name: Starchaser (arourke)
description:
Starchaser is an action oriented Metroidvania with a focus on combat and exploration with limited grind. In Starchaser, you play as Asterion the Minotaur, as he struggles to escape from the twisting halls of the labyrinth. Explore, find new upgrades, meet new friends and foes, and take down bosses as you progress through the game. 

    Starchaser is still in development, and is a student project spanning the course of two semesters, with one semester remaining, we hope to improve upon the current version a lot in this time.
